cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the construction of codes with hierarchical locality, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the use of algebraic curves in the construction of these codes, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR) and computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also involves calculations of parameters for these codes, which is a topic in data structures (cs.DS) and scientific computing (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses the construction of asymptotically good families of codes, which is a topic in complexity theory (cs.CC).
